# File lib/prawn/graphics/color.rb, line 63
      def method_missing(id,*args,&block)
        case(id.to_s)
        when /^fill_and_stroke_(.*)/
          send($1,*args,&block); fill_and_stroke
        when /^stroke_(.*)/
          send($1,*args,&block); stroke
        when /^fill_(.*)/
          send($1,*args,&block); fill
        else
          super
        end
      end
